channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‚ÄòNot tipping 20% makes you look like a fascist‚Äô: Why has tipping, once branded as un-American and anti-democratic, become such a hot political issue?
item.description: Tipped workers may comprise only 2.5% of the workforce, but all of us are tippers.

item.title: UAW president slams Stellantis CEO over job cuts, alleged price gouging
item.description: The comments are the latest in an ongoing back-and-forth between the CEO and union leader following contentious collective bargaining talks last year.

item.title: Gaza ceasefire talks paused with resumption planned next week
item.description: Gaza ceasefire talks in Doha were paused on Friday with negotiators set to meet again next week, mediators said.

item.title: Inside the $93 million Wall Street heist that stemmed from Russia
item.description: "The Crimes of Putin's Trader" recounts the rise and fall of Vladislav Klyushin and his business empire. He was just released from a U.S. prison in a prisoner swap.

item.title: Indian hospitals hit as doctors strike to protest rape, murder of medic
item.description: Hospitals and clinics across India turned away patients except for emergency cases on Saturday as medical professionals started a 24-hour shutdown.

item.title: ‚ÄòHe does not give his wife a penny to spend‚Äô: How can my sister ‚Äî short of divorce ‚Äî access her penny-pinching husband‚Äôs money?
item.description: ‚ÄòShe works for her own money, is not paid well for her occupation and sometimes has nothing to spend at all‚Äô

item.title: Harris outlines an 'opportunity economy' centered on cutting food, housing, family costs
item.description: Vice President Kamala Harris' policies would aim to lower the cost of groceries and prescription drugs, expand affordable housing and cut taxes.

item.title: Kremlin claims Ukraine used Western rockets to destroy bridge in Kursk region
item.description: Ukrainian army chief Oleksandr Syrskyi said on Friday that Kyiv's forces were advancing between one and three kilometres in some areas in the Kursk region.

item.title: Jackson Hole next week will give investors greater clarity on the interest rate outlook
item.description: Jerome Powell is scheduled to deliver the Federal Reserve chair's annual address at Jackson Hole, Wyoming next Friday morning.

item.title: Harris outlines an 'opportunity economy' centered on cutting food, housing, family costs

item.description: ‚ÄúIf she doesn‚Äôt repay the money, she believes she will lose her $100,000 job and possibly be sued for the $60,000.‚Äù

item.title: Amazon‚Äôs troubled drone delivery program faces latest challenge in Texas: Annoyed residents
item.description: Amazon is seeking FAA approval to expand its drone delivery service in College Station, Texas, but many residents aren't too happy.

item.title: Stocks close higher Friday as market comeback lifts S&P 500 to best week of 2024: Live updates
item.description: The S&P 500 gained for a seventh day in a row.
